basics.name: Antonios Marios Christonasis
basics.label: Data Scientist | Machine Learning Engineer| Electrical & Computer Engineer
basics.summary: Data Scientist with an Electrical and Computer Engineering background. Two years of professional experience building data-driven software solutions for companies in the Brainport region. Highly-skilled in Python, data analysis, machine learning, and development of descriptive/prescriptive dashboards. Looking for the next challenge in my career after acquiring the Professional Doctorate in Engineering (PDEng) Data Science title in November 2020.

work.summary: Full-time position as part of the PDEng Final Project
highlights: Designed and developed a data pipeline to count people inside vehicles through the classification of radar-sensor data.
Developed a method to detect events based on the classification of sound- sensor data.

work.summary: Worked on several team projects for partner companies of the PDeng program Data Science, such as: Dow Chemical Company, Saint Gobain , Heijmans , Brabant Water, Hendrix Genetics, TE Connectivity, Good Moovs, and ASML.
highlights: Communicated with stakeholders to define project goals and acquire domain knowledge.
Analyzed real-world datasets to provide business insights.
Developed machine learning models to solve relevant business problems.
Created descriptive and prescriptive dashboards to present results and assist decision-making.
